Body.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass 5), glass back (Gorilla Glass 5), aluminum frame
Body.\u00a0:
IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 1.5m for 30 mins)
MIL-STD-810G compliant

Platform.CPU: Octa-core (4x2.8 GHz Kryo 385 Gold & 4x1.7 GHz Kryo 385 Silver)

Main Camera.Single: 12 MP, f/1.5-2.4, 26mm (wide), 1/2.55", 1.4µm, dual pixel PDAF, OIS

Selfie camera.Dual:
8 MP, f/1.7, 25mm (wide), 1/3.6", 1.22µm, AF
2 MP (dedicated iris scanner camera)

Features.Sensors: Iris scanner, fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer, heart rate, SpO2
Features.\u00a0:
Samsung DeX (desktop experience support)
ANT+
Bixby natural language commands and dictation
Samsung Pay (Visa, MasterCard certified)

Misc.Colors: Midnight Black, Coral Blue, Titanium Gray, Lilac Purple
